title: Honoring Coach Russ Cellan and the 2010 Freeport High School varsity football team upon the occasion of their designation for special recognition
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION honoring Coach Russ Cellan and the 2010 Freeport
High School varsity football team upon the occasion of their designation
for special recognition

WHEREAS, It is  the  sense  of  this  Legislative  Body  to  acknowledge
outstanding  athletes  and  coaches  who  distinguish themselves through
their exceptional performance, attaining unprecedented success  and  the
highest level of personal achievement; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and fully in accord with its long-
standing  traditions, it is the intent of this Legislative Body to honor
Coach Russ Cellan and the 2010 Freeport  High  School  varsity  football
team upon the occasion of their designation for special recognition; and
  WHEREAS,  For the second time in the last three years and 11th time in
history, Freeport High School won the Rutgers Cup as the most  outstand-
ing  high school football team in Nassau County; the Red Devils finished
with a record of 11-1 and defeated Floyd, 62-35, to win the Long  Island
Class I championship; and
  WHEREAS,  This  fine  honor  is  the  fifth Rutgers Cup for Coach Russ
Cellan, who completed his 25th coaching season at Freeport; and
  WHEREAS, In a close, two-team race, Freeport High School received  129
votes  and  Lynbrook,  the  Long  Island Class III champion, earned 120;
these were the only two schools to receive votes; and
  WHEREAS, The Rutgers Award, presented annually since 1937, was  deter-
mined by a vote of Nassau coaches; Freeport's victory over Floyd was the
highest-scoring  game  in  the history of the Long Island championships,
which began in 1992; the Red Devils also broke Sayville's record  of  55
points  in  a  game,  set in Sayville's Long Island Championship victory
over Wantagh in 2004; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is moved to recognize the 2010 Freeport
High School varsity football team which has clearly made a  contribution
to  the  spirit  of  excellence which is a tradition of its school; now,
therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  Coach Russ Cellan and the 2010 Freeport High School varsity foot-
ball team upon the occasion of their designation  for  special  recogni-
tion; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Coach Russ Cellan and to the 2010 Freeport High School varsi-
ty football team.
